name: Insight (Annikasc)
description:
"Insight" was created as a part of the bachelor's degree and is an exploratory 2.5 D puzzle platformer. The core mechanics of the game consist of a flashlight, with which the player switches between an "ugly" and "beautiful" world. The goal of the game is to solve puzzles and bring lost souls back to the matching world.

INFORMATION: This game is supposed to be played with a controller but it is also possible to play it with keyboard (notice the different controls in the main menu)

Team
  • Lukas Niehaus (Code)
  • Annika Schwab (Game Design, Art)
University of Applied Sciences Europe 

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Applied Sciences Europe. Supervised by:
                                                   

  •  Prof. Florian Berger
  • https://twitter.com/flberger 
  • Prof. Sebastian Stamm
  • https://twitter.com/thestamm

Bachelor Project  (WinterSemester 2019/20)
